help-file.title: "DRACONIC CRESCENDO"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Protection
"Draconic Crescendo" allows the piper to protect those in the room from dragons, similar to the protection spells.
See also: INSTRUMENT, WAIL, PIPER, SKILL_PIPER
# DRAG (Command)
